name: Headpunk: The Comic-Style Battle Chaos
description:
Headpunk: The Comic-Style Battle Chaos, or Headpunk for short, is a 3D comic-style fantastic player vs. player deathmatch game.

  • 6 different types of weapons

    Pistol, Assault Rifle, Pump Gun, Sniper, Sub Machine and Rocket Launcher. - Most of these weapons are powerful. Kill players in a region in an area with a rocket launcher, or pierce your enemy's head with a sniper.

  • Character Customization

    Skin Color, Top and Bottom outfit color. - In most deathmatch games, you're stuck with one model or appearance, but Headpunk isn't like that. Better wearables will be added with future updates to the game.

  • 4 different Maps

    Training, Apocalyptic City, Midnight City and Industrial. - Play on well optimized maps. More maps will be added in the future.

  • Battle with real gamers

    There are no bots so, everyone in the game is real.

The Gameplay

This game has a simple gameplay. Shoot enemy players (everybody is your enemy) or find new tactics or improve them for even more fun.
